```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Wh9kCWrxjaCjhN-j7dryvMvCnsh3LiqITC9_9lponEQ/edit?usp=sharing", sheet = "schedule")
```

::: column-screen-right
```{r, echo = FALSE}
d |>
  mutate(
    Date = as.Date(Date),
  ) |>
    gt() |> 
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(Slides)),
    fn = function(x) {
      ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa("laptop", fill_opacity = 0.1),
        glue::glue("<a href = {x}>{fontawesome::fa('laptop')}</a>")
      )
    }
  ) |> 
  fmt_date(Date, date_style = 30) |>
  sub_missing(columns = c(Date, Class, Topic, Notes), missing_text = "") |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(Slides)
    ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(Date, Topic, Notes)
    ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(Date, Topic)
    )
  ) |> 
    gt::cols_width(everything())
```
